Text: Slinzega is a type of air-dried meat produced in Valtellina, in the Italian Alps.
Triplets:<Slinzega
1:
--------------------
Text: Slinzega:  It is made in a similar manner to Bresaola, with smaller pieces of meat, which therefore bear a stronger taste.

Text: Slinzega:  According to some sources it originally used horse meat rather than beef.
